Welcome to the
EduVisa Community!


We're a global community of students, by students, for students, in a time when we're as disconnected as ever.

  Join Us On Discord!

Who We Are

Above all, EduVisa is a lively online community of students, sharing our journeys through high school and college. Our members come from all around the globe (over 80 countries!) and all walks of life. Beyond our community, EduVisa is also an academic support network, providing services like one-on-one tutoring and mentorship for our community members, free of charge.

How We Support Our Community

Webinars

We regularly sponsor webinars hosted by community members and outside experts alike! They range from casual coffee chats to informational seminars, covering all aspects of high school and college. Our current webinar series focuses on the college admissions process.

Tutoring

Our expert instructors provide one-on-one tutoring for all subjects and standardized tests for members of our community, totally free of charge. Our tutors, top scorers in their respective fields, are motivated and willing to help you get your dream scores!â€‹

Mentorship

In our mentorship program, college undergraduates and high school upperclassmen use their high school experience to guide fellow students to make the most out of their high school experience including essay review, resume building, scholarships, and more.

Get Involved!

We are always looking for high school and college students to help us support our community! Whether you are good at art, like to post on social media, have great scores on tests and in school, want to share your college application journey with others, or like writing articles, there's always a position for you on our team!
